text: The Telluride Bluegrass Festival is an annual music festival held in Telluride, Colorado. The festival is put on by Planet Bluegrass. The festival mainly focuses on bluegrass music. It has had artists in the past such as Nickel Creek, Bela Fleck, and Chris Thile. ==Other websites== *Official web site *Library of Congress *Local newspaper *Telluride Visitor Information Category:Music festivals in the United States Category:Colorado
title: Telluride Bluegrass Festival
